title: Laughing Fish's 200,000 lifetime upvote spectacular! (Come and get your free skins!)
body:
#Closed. Thanks for playing! See winners and details in the [pinned comment](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/2RdVoyti-laughing-fishs-200000-lifetime-upvote-spectacular-come-and-get-your-free-skins?comment=01c5) below!

https://i.imgur.com/xIOOyEo.png[/img]

It's a Christmas miracle! Just in time for snowdown I have achieved this monumental achievement! A lot has changed since the last upvote spectacular. I ascended to the rank of Moderator, I reached gold (The snack that smiles back!), and I have been working hard to try and reforge M&G and return it to its former glory. This has required me to change my tactics and philosophies when posting on the boards. The community has changed, and to be a proper ruler I must change with them. There have been bumps and obstacles along the way, but M&G is thriving once again, and I have reclaimed my throne atop it. Truly, it feels good to be King!

https://i.imgur.com/89aiFos.gif[/img]


But, as much as I would like to talk about my own personal glory, the reality is I played but a small role in all this. None of this matters without the community, without the people who come to M&G and support each other. People may complain a lot, and the boards may often be filled with salt. But this really is an incredible community, and I am proud and thankful to be a part of it. 

https://i.imgur.com/JF4EOlJ.gif[/img]

Now, enough rambling. Onward to the real reason everyone is here: Free skins!

https://i.imgur.com/xSnJcKv.gif[/img]

So here is how it will work: Since this is Snowdown, everyone must post a funny Christmas related gif or meme. For example:

https://i.imgur.com/fyy0wZI.gif[/img]
https://i.imgur.com/i1nrGUR.jpg[/img]

Oh, and as always. **Say my name.** This is not a joke, if you do not say my name you are illegible to win.

https://i.imgur.com/G5YGnbu.gif[/img]

Additional prizes will be unlocked as this thread gains upvotes. Hey, I'm not *completely* selfless here ;)

Prize tiers (each tier includes all previous tier's rewards):

* 1 upvote: Random mystery skin **Unlocked**
* 50 upvotes: Random mystery skin **Unlocked**
* 100 upvotes: Choice of any skin worth 1350 RP or less **Unlocked**
* 150 upvotes: Random mystery skin **Unlocked**
* 200 upvotes: Random mystery skin **Unlocked**
* 300 upvotes: Choice of any skin worth 1350 RP or less **Unlocked**
* 400 upvotes: Random mystery skin
* 500 upvotes: Choice of any skin worth 1350 or less
* 600 upvotes: Random mystery skin
* 700 upvotes: Random mystery skin
* 1000 upvotes: Choice of any skin worth 1820 or less
* 1,000,000 upvotes: Every Teemo skin available in the shop


Contest rules:

* To enter, post a Christmas related gif or meme in the comments below, and make sure to say the name **Laughing Fish**
* Only one entry per person will be counted.
* Winners will be selected at random. Each poster is only eligible to win a single prize.
* Open to NA only (sorry EUW folks, but I only have an NA account)
* Contest ends **Saturday, December 16, at 3:00pm EST**
* Upvotes will be counted using BEK, so it will be the gross number of upvotes NOT the net (so downvoting has zero effect). 


For help posting images or gifs, please check out the following guide:

* [Posting Images and Gifs on the Boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/esjzN2Q1-posting-images-and-gifs-on-the-boards)

Happy Snowdown to all, including to my many enemies and those who have fought me and lost so badly they just don't know what to do. Love!

replies.body:
#With a total of 361 upvotes, 6 prizes were unlocked. The winners are:

1: Mystery skin: ninjaroxas (NA)
2: mystery skin: Votable Jester (NA)
3: Choice of any skin priced at 1350rp or less: Trídent (NA)
4: Mystery skin: SupportTéémo (NA)
5: Mystery skin: winston gergill (NA)
6: Choice of any skin priced at 1350rp or less:  Poindextra (NA)


Thanks for playing everyone! Friend requests have been sent to the winners. If the request is not accepted within 14-days, the prize is forfeit. Due to restrictions on gifting, it will be 24-48 hours after the friend request is accepted that the prize will be sent.
https://i.imgur.com/y3b9r86.gif[/img]

Come to EUNE man, we have good alcohol....and nothing else, but it's really good.

> Upvotes will be counted using BEK, so it will be the gross number of upvotes NOT the net (so downvoting has zero effect).

The hell is BEK?
You can just right click the number to show up/down votes anyway.
[Boards Enhancement Kit](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/U8uw8k1l-02-boards-enhancement-kit-november-26)
